projects.title: Tides
projects.projectDescription: Tides allows users to save locations across Florida using NOAA tide information from their CO-OPS stations and APIs. The site features modern design and saved states so users only have to input their locations once!

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.projectDescription: My portfolio, that you are currently seeing now, allows viewers to learn more about me, both in the paragraphs I've typed and in the design choices/features I've made. It is built using react with elements in ThreeJS.

projects.title: Spotifriends
projects.projectDescription: A Spotify playlist generator with Spotify API and ElasticSearch integration to create personalized playlists from a 100,000+ song database. Users' favorite artists and genres are used to produce a dynamic playlist of a specified length. Features 3D visualizations of the playlistâ€™s parameters using React-Three-Fiber. Developed in collaboration with a team of 5 talented group-members
